description: Retrieves the applied quota value for the specified account-level or resource-level quota.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Querying service quotas helps adversaries understand the limits and capacity of cloud services, aiding in planning resource hijacking or other attacks.

incidents.description: GuardDuty Extended Threat Detection uncovers cryptomining campaign on Amazon EC2 and Amazon ECS

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetServiceQuota to enumerate EC2 or other service limits before launching resource hijacking campaigns such as cryptomining.
